Home Sweet Home

Hobart Crossing Apartment Homes Offer More.

Each Hobart Crossing apartment home features luxury amenities and a refined, contemporary feel.

  • Well-appointed with high-end cabinetry, granite countertops and appealing finishes
  • Complete upgraded appliance package
  • In-unit full-size washer and dryer
  • Private entrances (some units) and quality construction for quiet and privacy
  • Programmable individual gas-forced air heat and central air
  • Comfort-height toilets

The Hobart Crossing development also offers:

  • Elevators
  • Cat and dog friendly policies
  • Underground, heated parking
  • On-site storage lockers
  • Clubroom with kitchen
  • 24-hour fitness center with professional equipment
  • Private outdoor pool with lounging area, grills and an area for sunbathing

Imagine yourself in a stunning Hobart Crossing apartment home.

Choose the floor plan that best suits your needs.

Hobart Crossing’s Building Four Is Coming!
Opening this December, Building Four…

Applications are now being accepted for Hobart Crossing’s charming and most recently constructed building number four. Occupancy of the third floor will begin between November 15 and December 1, with the second floor opening in January, and the first floor opening in February or March. Building Four is the largest at Hobart Crossing and houses both one- and two-bedroom apartments in addition to studios. Please call to schedule a showing soon, as these units will fill quickly!

About Hobart Crossing

There’s an exciting place to call home in the greater Green Bay area, Hobart Crossing. Amenities include a large outdoor pool area with grills and lounging space, roomy fitness center outfitted with professional equipment and a spacious clubroom. Each apartment includes granite countertops, in-unit washer/dryer and upgraded appliances.
